settings.title: Lose a size in 28 days!
settings.subtext: It's just a quick 8-minute workout each day that will give you real results.

settings.title: About Evergreen Wellness®
settings.text: Evergreen Wellness® is a resource dedicated to helping people 55+ enjoy happier, healthier lives. Whether you’re already well on your path to wellness or just getting started, it’s never too late to learn something new, boost your health, and find your joy. Your time is now and we are here to help.

settings.title: Meet Jaime Brenkus
settings.text: Jaime is the nationally recognized fitness expert who revolutionized the fitness world with his 8-Minute Abs program in the 1990s. He has helped millions of people around the world to lose millions of pounds and inches. Jaime is living proof that his fitness philosophies and programs deliver real results.

settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/238468611" width="1280" height="720" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen="" mozallowfullscreen="" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
settings.title: Lose a size in 28 days in just 8-minutes a day!
settings.subtext:
Are you ready to look and feel better than you have in years? The 28-Day Size Down Challenge is uniquely designed for people like you who have real lives, real commitments, and want real results. Let celebrity trainer, Jaime Brenkus, guide you through your transformation to lose one size in 28 days – following his easy, convenient, and effective program. It's just a quick 8-minute workout each day! Not to mention you'll lose one size, lose fat, gain muscle, have a boost of energy,
and build your self-confidence.

For your convenience, the 28-Day Size Down Challenge is exclusively an online program, viewable on any computer or tablet with internet connection. There's no waiting for the program to be delivered - you can purchase it today and begin the online program when you're ready. Once you buy it, you own it forever!

settings.title:
Hosted by Jaime Brenkus, inventor of the blockbuster-selling
8-Minute Video Series!
About Jaime Brenkus
settings.text:
You may already know Jaime Brenkus as the guy who invented 8-Minute Abs. The 8-Minute Abs video series swept the nation in the mid-nineties, as the first program to recognize that time (specifically, lack of it) was a critical obstacle to living a lifestyle of exercise and healthy eating habits.

Over the past three decades, fitness-expert Jaime Brenkus has had the pleasure of helping millions of people lose millions of pounds and inches. But it’s not just about the pounds and inches, Jaime has helped people become healthier and more confident by feeling better, looking younger, and living longer. And now at age 56, he has joined Evergreen Wellness®, as its Physical Wellness Ambassador, to help baby boomers keep fit and healthy for the best of their lives.

settings.title: What You Get
settings.content: The 28-Day Size Down Challenge was designed for normal people who are looking to take an achievable step toward fitness and physical wellness.

Forget aggressive, intimidating trainers, unrealistic routines, or loud, in-your-face music. Instead, Jaime offers easy step-by-step instructions as part of a complete fitness and nutrition prescription. This program includes:

settings.title: Our Program Includes
settings.content:
20 8-Minute Daily Workout Videos designed specifically for people 55+

28 Daily Menus to ensure your diet is working as hard as you are

4 Weeks of Grocery Lists to take the guess work out of meal planning

4 Self-Reflection Lessons to help identify where your opportunities for improvement lie 

Complete, Easy-To-Follow Fitness Calendar

Weekly Emails and Updates

Access to Jaime's Personal Email so you can reach out to Jaime for support at any time.

settings.title: Are you ready to lose fat, gain muscle, build self-confidence, boost your energy, and lose one size by following our 28-day program, for just 8 minutes a day?
settings.subtext: only $27.00
settings.button_label: Yes, I'm Up for the Challenge!

settings.title: Evergreen Wellness® Is a Resource Dedicated to Helping People 55+ Enjoy Happier, Healthier Lives
settings.subtext: We take a holistic approach to wellness in hopes of enhancing your life in every way – physically, socially, emotionally, spiritually, intellectually, and financially. Whether you’re already well on your path to wellness or just getting started, we’re here to inspire you with helpful information and resources, to energize you with unique live events, and connect you with others who can help guide and motivate you on your journey.

settings.title: Your One-Stop Resource
settings.content: Through exciting one-of-a-kind live events, videos, and articles, Evergreen Wellness® explores a broad range of subjects and provides information designed to empower you to be the happiest and healthiest you can be. If you’re 55 or over (heck, even if you’re just getting close to being 55 or over), Evergreen Wellness is here for you.

settings.title: Your Best Years Are Yet to Come
settings.content: It’s never too late to learn something new, boost your health, and find your joy. Your time is now and we are here to help. Join us online at myEGW.com

settings.title: Videos
settings.text: Jaime's daily 8-minute videos combine resistance and constant movement in the same workout to yield the best long-term results in the shortest amount of time.

settings.title: Menus
settings.text: All our delicious recipes were created by our registered dietitian to be light and healthy - without sacrificing the taste. We've included low-calorie versions for breakfast favorites, fast and nutritious lunches, and mouth-watering dinners and desserts. And, they're easy enough for busy people to prepare.

settings.title: Grocery Lists
settings.text: For your convenience, we compiled four weeks worth of grocery lists based on our dietitian's menus. Be sure to take these lists with you when you shop.

settings.title: Self-Reflections
settings.text: Weekly Self-Reflections help you better understand and manage your habits, feelings, and emotions surrounding a healthy lifestyle, as well as mange your environment on a daily basis. They provide a unique opportunity for introspection and mental training that can help keep you on the right path for optimal short-term and long-term results.

settings.title: Meet Jaime Brenkus for Evergreen Wellness®
settings.subtext:
You probably already know Jaime Brenkus as the fitness expert who revolutionized the fitness world with his 8-Minute Abs program in the 1990s. The entire 8-Minute video series became a national sensation as the first program to recognize that time (specifically, the lack of it) was a key obstacle for people who wanted to incorporate exercise and proper nutrition into their healthy lifestyle.

Over the last 28 years, Jaime has helped millions of people around the world to lose millions of pounds and inches. He is a fitness advocate for the President's Challenge, author of Get Lean in 15; creator of 8 Minute Abs, Slim & FIT, and Perfect Portions; and designer of Slim-Fast and Kathy Ireland's award winning videos, Body Specifics and Reach. 

Today, at 56 years old, Jaime continues to practice the healthy lifestyle that he created, and now, he's here to help you do the same!

settings.title: Have Your Own Personal Trainer and Personal Chef Come Right Into Your Home
settings.content:
Jaime cuts through the myriad of conflicting exercise and nutrition stories in the media and the hundreds of fad exercise programs promoted on television that are more appropriate for 20 year old athletes than real people. Jaime's programs are tailoring specifically for real people age 55+ with easy-to-follow steps for success. Even if you’ve struggled in the past, you’ll find his formula works every time. As Jaime says, “It’s all about changing your habits – eating, cooking, shopping, fitness (and probably more importantly) – changing your thinking habits.”

It doesn’t matter what your current level of fitness is or what your goals are. Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, build muscle, increase energy, change how you look, or just get off the couch and get moving, you will find plenty of strategies to help you look better and feel better while easily fitting your new lifestyle into your busy day-to-day activities.

settings.title: Learn What Millions of People Already Know
settings.content: Jaime Brenkus is the coach and personal trainer that people have trusted for nearly 30 years to provide proven, effective strategies for living your best life of physical wellness. He is living proof that his programs work. Check out some of his programs below!

Jaime is the nationally recognized fitness expert who revolutionized the fitness world with his 8-Minute Abs program in the 1990s. He has helped millions of people around the world to lose millions of pounds and inches. Today, at 56 years old, Jaime is living proof that his fitness philosophies and programs deliver results. He continues to practice the healthy lifestyle that he perfected and is here to help you do the same!

settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/240709552" width="1280" height="720" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen="" mozallowfullscreen="" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
settings.title: Meet Jaime Brenkus for Evergreen Wellness®
settings.subtext:
You probably already know Jaime Brenkus as the fitness expert who revolutionized the fitness world with his 8-Minute Abs program in the 1990s. The entire 8-Minute video series became a national sensation as the first program to recognize that time (specifically, the lack of it) was a key obstacle for people who wanted to incorporate exercise and proper nutrition into their healthy lifestyle.

Over three decades, Jaime has helped millions of people around the world to lose millions of pounds and inches. He is a fitness advocate for the President's Challenge; author of Get Lean in 15; creator of 8 Minute Abs, Slim & FIT, and Perfect Portions; and designer of Slim-Fast and Kathy Ireland's award winning videos, Body Specifics and Reach. 

Now in his mid-50s, Jaime continues to practice the healthy lifestyle that he created, and now, he's here to help you do the same!

settings.title: Following Jaime Brenkus' Programs Is Like Having Your Own Personal Trainer And Personal Chef Coming Right Into Your Home.
settings.content:
Jaime cuts through the myriad of conflicting exercise and nutrition stories in the media and the hundreds of fad exercise programs promoted on television that are more appropriate for 20-year-old athletes than real people. Jaime's programs are tailoried specifically for real people age 55+ with easy-to-follow steps for success. Even if you’ve struggled in the past, you’ll find his formula works every time. As Jaime says, “It’s all about changing your habits – eating, cooking, shopping, fitness (and probably more importantly) – changing your thinking habits.”

It doesn’t matter what your current level of fitness is or what your goals are. Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, build muscle, increase energy, change how you look, or just get off the couch and get moving, you will find plenty of strategies to help you look better and feel better while easily fitting your new lifestyle into your busy day-to-day activities.

settings.title: Learn What Millions of People Already Know
settings.content: Jaime Brenkus is the coach and personal trainer that people have trusted for nearly 30 years to provide proven, effective strategies for living your best life of physical wellness. He is living proof that his programs work. Check out some of his programs below!

settings.title: Quick Start Guide
settings.subtext: Before you start this program, we'd like to give you a quick glimpse of everything that's included within the program and how it all works!

settings.title: First, let’s go grocery shopping!
settings.content: The 28-Day Challenge includes four weeks of healthy meal plans, integral to your success. Click through to this page where you can download your Week 1 grocery shopping list.

settings.title: Get equipped!
settings.content:
You’ll need the following equipment to participate in these exercises.

1. Two Dumbbells/Kettle Bells (3-5 pounds each)

2. Yoga Mat

3. A Sturdy Chair

4. Water Bottle

5. Towel

settings.title: Got your food and equipment? Let’s go!
settings.content: Once you’re stocked with Week 1 groceries and have your equipment, click Day 1 of your program calendar when you’re ready to begin. We've provided you a daily workout preview video so that you know exactly what to expect and how to prepare for your workout. Then once you have everything you need, simply play the Day 1 video to get started. And, of course, follow Jaime’s proven meal plan for that day.

settings.title: Check it off!
settings.content: As you complete each day, check that day’s Completed checkbox to track your progress. And share your progress with friends and family on social media with our social media share feature.

settings.title: Keep it going!
settings.content: In Week 1 of The 28-Day Size Down Challenge, you’ll exercise the first 5 days (8 minutes each day), and then enjoy 2 days of rest for a total of 7 days. This goes for Weeks 2, 3, and 4, as well. On the days you’re not exercising, continue to follow Jaime’s meal plan, while using your rest days to purchase your meal plan food for the upcoming week.

settings.title: Those are the basics. Now go out there and get results!
settings.subtext: Have questions along the way? Or want to share your progress? Just contact Jaime Brenkus at jbrenkus@myevergreenwellness.com - remember, you have his personal email, so don't hesitate to get in contact with your virtual personal trainer!

settings.title: Little Black Dress
settings.text: Ladies, fit back into that little black dress in just 2 weeks! Jaime Brenkus created this series of quick 8-minute workouts, combining them with daily meal plans to help you make it happen! It's a program designed for women 55+ who want to look and feel great! Are you ready to fit back into that dress?

settings.title: Gentlemen, Restart Your Engines
settings.text: Gentlemen, it's time to restart your engines! Have you been trying to drop a few inches but having trouble finding the time? This 2-week workout and nutrition program is designed for men 55+. Jaime Brenkus is your personal trainer for the next 14 days and will help get you real results in just 8 minutes per day!

settings.title: Metabolic Recipes
settings.text: Good and good for you! As a reward for finishing this challenge, get Jaime's metabolic recipes to help you maintain the happier, healthier you. It's free!

settings.title: Jaime's Programs
settings.text: Check out Jaime's other effective 8-minute programs including Gentlemen, Restart Your Engines and Little Black Dress.

settings.title: Your 28-day Challenge Story
settings.text: We'd love to hear about your 28-day journey to looking and feeling better. Share your story and be an inspiration to others.

settings.title: Come back! You can do it again.
settings.text: Ready to lose another size and go another round with the 28-Day Challenge? You're in charge, so go for it anytime.

settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/240709552" width="1280" height="720" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen="" mozallowfullscreen="" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

You probably already know Jaime Brenkus as the fitness expert who revolutionized the fitness world with his 8-Minute Abs program in the 1990s. The entire 8-Minute video series became a national sensation as the first program to recognize that time (specifically, the lack of it) was a key obstacle for people who wanted to incorporate exercise and proper nutrition into their healthy lifestyle.

Over three decades, Jaime has helped millions of people around the world to lose millions of pounds and inches. Now in his mid-50s, Jaime continues to practice the healthy lifestyle that he created, and now, he's here to help you do the same!

settings.title: Learn What Millions of People Already Know
settings.content: Jaime Brenkus is the coach and personal trainer that people have trusted for nearly 30 years to provide proven, effective strategies for living your best life of physical wellness. He is living proof that his programs work. Check out some of his programs below!

settings.title: Gift Cards Are Here!
settings.content:
Give someone you love the gift of health and happiness with an Evergreen Wellness® gift card. These can be used toward purchase of any Evergreen Wellness product or program, like Jaime Brenkus’ amazing new 28-Day Size Down Challenge. 
Shop healthy—order your gift cards today!

settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/238583055" width="1280" height="720" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen="" mozallowfullscreen="" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
settings.title: Fit back into that little black dress in only 2 weeks! It's just 8 minutes a day!
settings.subtext:
Looking to get back into your little black dress? Let Jaime Brenkus virtually coach you with his 14-Day Little Black Dress program, which includes a clean meal plan, easy fat-burning workouts, and daily inspirations to help you look and feel better. Jaime will be with you every step of the way and will be available to answer any of your questions via his personal email. The Little Black Dress schedule takes just 8 minutes a day, and in only two weeks, you'll start dropping body fat, strengthening your body, and increasing energy.

For your convenience, the Little Black Dress program is exclusively an online program, viewable on any computer or tablet with internet connection. There's no waiting for the program to be delivered - you can purchase it today and begin the online program when you're ready.
Once you buy it, you own it forever!

settings.title:
Hosted by Jaime Brenkus, inventor of the blockbuster-selling
8-Minute Video Series!
About Jaime Brenkus
settings.text:
You may already know Jaime Brenkus as the guy who invented 8-Minute Abs. The 8-Minute Abs video series swept the nation in the mid-nineties, as the first program to recognize that time (specifically, lack of it) was a critical obstacle to living a lifestyle of exercise and healthy eating habits.

Over the past three decades, fitness-expert Jaime Brenkus has had the pleasure of helping millions of people lose millions of pounds and inches. But it’s not just about the pounds and inches, Jaime has helped people become healthier and more confident by feeling better and looking younger. And now at age 56, he has joined Evergreen Wellness®, as its Physical Wellness Ambassador, to help baby boomers keep fit and healthy for the best of their lives.

settings.title: What You Get
settings.content: The Little Black Dress fitness program was designed for women 55+ who want to look and feel better—and fit back into that little black dress.

settings.subtext: It was not designed for elite athletes, but rather for real women who want to take the necessary steps to lead happier, healthier lives. Through a combination of full body, metabolic strength training, and clean, easy, and healthy recipes, you will burn fat, lose inches, and feel as great as you look. This achievable step-by-step transformation program includes:

settings.title: Our Program Includes
settings.content:
10 8-minute fitness videos designed specifically for women 55+

14 daily menus

Grocery shopping list

Fitness calendar

2 Self-Reflections

Email Jaime directly for one-on-one coaching
settings.content_2:
Sturdy Chair

Yoga Mat

2 Hand Weights, each 3-5 pounds

settings.title: Bonus!
settings.subtext: Access to Jaime's personal email so you can reach out to him for support at any time!

settings.title: Drop excess fat, strengthen your body, increase your energy, and fit back into your little black dress by following our two-week program!
Quick Start Guide
settings.subtext: Before you start this program, we'd like to give you a quick glimpse of everything that's included within the program and how it all works!

settings.title: First, let’s go grocery shopping!
settings.content: The Little Black Dress includes two weeks of healthy meal plans, integral to your success. Click through to this page where you can download your Week 1 grocery shopping list.

settings.title: Get equipped!
settings.content:
You’ll need the following equipment to participate in these exercises.

1. Sturdy chair

2. Yoga mat

3. 2 hand weights each between 3-5 lb

4. Groceries

settings.title: Got your food and equipment? Let’s go!
settings.content: Once you’re stocked with Week 1 groceries and have your equipment, click Day 1 of your program calendar when you’re ready to begin. We've provided you a daily workout preview video so that you know exactly what to expect and how to prepare for your workout. Then once you have everything you need, simply play the Day 1 video to get started. And, of course, follow Jaime’s proven meal plan for that day.

settings.title: Check it off!
settings.content: As you complete each day, check that day’s Completed checkbox to track your progress. And share your progress with friends and family on social media with our social media share feature.

settings.title: Keep it going!
settings.content: In Week 1 of The Little Black Dress, you’ll exercise the first 5 days (8 minutes each day), and then enjoy 2 days of rest for a total of 7 days. This goes for Weeks 2 as well. On the days you’re not exercising, continue to follow Jaime’s meal plan, while using your rest days to purchase your meal plan food for the upcoming week.

settings.title: Those are the basics. Now go out there and get results!
settings.subtext: Have questions along the way? Or want to share your progress? Just contact Jaime Brenkus at jbrenkus@myevergreenwellness.com - remember, you have his personal email, so don't hesitate to get in contact with your virtual personal trainer!

settings.title: Jaime's Programs
settings.text: Check out Jaime's other effective 8-minute programs including 28-Day Size Down Challenge and Gentlemen, Restart Your Engines.

settings.title: Your Little Black Dress Story
settings.text: We'd love to hear about your 14-day journey to fitting back into your little black dress!  Share your story and be an inspiration to others.

settings.title: Come back! You can do it again!
settings.text: You own the Little Black Dress program so when you're ready, consider doing it  again to look and feel better all over again. You're in charge, so go for it anytime.

settings.title: Videos
settings.text: Jaime's 8-minute daily videos are comprised of fat-burning, body-sculpting exercises. These short burst workouts are focused on firming and toning in all the right places and melting fat from your body – reducing cellulite – to give you a flatter tummy, leaner hips, shapelier thighs, and a firmer, rounded, uplifted appearance in your buns.

settings.title: Menus
settings.text: All our delicious recipes were created by our registered dietitian to be clean and healthy—without sacrificing flavor. We've included controlled calorie meals for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. And, they're easy enough for busy people to prepare.

settings.title: Grocery Lists
settings.text: For your convenience, we compiled two weeks worth of grocery lists based on our dietitian's menus. Be sure to take these lists with you when you shop.

settings.title: Self-Reflections
settings.text: Weekly Self-Reflections help you better understand and manage your habits, feelings, and emotions surrounding a healthy lifestyle, as well as mange your environment on a daily basis. They provide a unique opportunity for introspection and mental training that can help keep you on the right path for optimal short-term and long-term results.

settings.title: Videos
settings.text: Jaime's daily 8-minute videos combine resistance and constant movement in the same workout to yield the best long-term results in the shortest amount of time. These short-burst workouts are focused on all the right places for men – attacking belly fat, toning arms, and strengthening legs.

settings.title: Menus
settings.text: No wimpy meals here! All our delicious recipes were created by our registered dietitian to be both filling and healthy. We've included low-calorie versions for breakfast favorites, nutritious lunches, and satisfying dinners, and they're easy enough for busy people to prepare.

settings.title: Grocery Lists
settings.text: For your convenience, we compiled two weeks worth of grocery lists based on our dietitian's menus. Be sure to take these lists with you when you shop.

settings.title: Self-Reflections
settings.text: Weekly Self-Reflections help you better understand and manage your habits, feelings, and emotions surrounding a healthy lifestyle, as well as manage your environment on a daily basis. They provide a unique opportunity for introspection and mental training that can help keep you on the right path for optimal short-term and long-term results.

settings.title: Quick Start Guide
settings.subtext: Before you start this program, we'd like to give you a quick glimpse of everything that's included within the program and how it all works!

settings.title: First, let’s go grocery shopping!
settings.content: Gentlemen, Restart Your Engines includes two weeks of healthy meal plans, integral to your success. Click through to this page where you can download your Week 1 grocery shopping list.

settings.title: Get equipped!
settings.content:
You’ll need the following equipment to participate in these exercises.

1. Two Dumbbells/Kettle Bells (3-5 pounds each)

2. Yoga mat

3. A sturdy chair

4. Water Bottle

5. Towel

settings.title: Got your food and equipment? Let’s go!
settings.content: Once you’re stocked with Week 1 groceries and have your equipment, click Day 1 of your program calendar when you’re ready to begin. We've provided you a daily workout preview video so that you know exactly what to expect and how to prepare for your workout. Then once you have everything you need, simply play the Day 1 video to get started. And, of course, follow Jaime’s proven meal plan for that day.

settings.title: Check it off!
settings.content: As you complete each day, check that day’s Completed checkbox to track your progress. And share your progress with friends and family on social media with our social media share feature.

settings.title: Keep it going!
settings.content: In Week 1 of The Gentlemen, Start Your Engines, you’ll exercise the first 5 days (8 minutes each day), and then enjoy 2 days of rest for a total of 7 days. This goes for Weeks 2, 3, and 4, as well. On the days you’re not exercising, continue to follow Jaime’s meal plan, while using your rest days to purchase your meal plan food for the upcoming week.

settings.title: Those are the basics. Now go out there and get results!
settings.subtext: Have questions along the way? Or want to share your progress? Just contact Jaime Brenkus at jbrenkus@myevergreenwellness.com - remember, you have his personal email, so don't hesitate to get in contact with your virtual personal trainer!

settings.video_embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/238582937" width="1280" height="720" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen="" mozallowfullscreen="" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
settings.title: Get your motor runnin’ in just two weeks. Only 8 minutes a day!
settings.subtext:
Are you ready to bring your body out of retirement? Let Jaime Brenkus virtually coach you with Gentleman, Restart Your Engines—the program designed exclusively for older men who want to get fitter. This 14-day program consists of a clean meal plan, easy-to-follow fat-burning and body-sculpting workouts, and daily inspirations to help you look better and feel better. Jaime will be with you every step of the way and will be available to answer any of your questions as you'll have access to his personal email. The Gentleman, Restart Your Engines schedule takes just 8 minutes a day, and in only two weeks, you'll start dropping body fat, strengthening your body, and increasing energy. 

 

For your convenience, the Gentlemen, Restart Your Engines program is exclusively an online program, viewable on any computer or tablet with internet connection. There's no waiting for the program to be delivered - you can purchase it today and begin the online program when you're ready. Once you buy it, you own it forever!

settings.title:
Hosted by Jaime Brenkus, inventor of the blockbuster-selling
8-Minute Video Series!
About Jaime Brenkus
settings.text:
You may already know Jaime Brenkus as the guy who invented 8-Minute Abs. The 8-Minute Abs video series swept the nation in the mid-nineties, as the first program to recognize that time (specifically, lack of it) was a critical obstacle to living a lifestyle of exercise and healthy eating habits.

Over the past three decades, fitness-expert Jaime Brenkus has had the pleasure of helping millions of people lose millions of pounds and inches. But it’s not just about the pounds and inches, Jaime has helped people become healthier and more confident by feeling better, looking younger, and living longer. And now at age 56, he has joined Evergreen Wellness®, as its Physical Wellness Ambassador, to help baby boomers keep fit and healthy for the best of their lives.

settings.title: What You Get
settings.content: The, Gentleman Restart Your Engines fitness program was designed for real men, who have real schedules, real lives, and want real results.

settings.subtext: Who wants aggressive, intimidating trainers and unrealistic exercise challenges? Instead, you can have easy-to-follow, step-by-step instructions set to daily 8-minute exercise routines. Through a combination of simple, metabolic strength training and easy, healthy recipes, you will burn fat and feel better than you have in years! This achievable step-by-step transformation program includes:

settings.title: Our Program Includes
settings.content:
10 8-minute daily workout videos designed specifically for older men

14 daily menus to ensure your diet is working as hard as you are

2 weeks of grocery lists to take the guess work out of meal planning

2 self-reflection lessons to help identify where your opportunities for improvement lie 

Complete, easy-to-follow fitness calendar

Weekly emails and updates

Access to Jaime's personal email so you can reach out to him for support at any time

settings.title: Bonus!
settings.subtext: Access to Jaime's personal email so you can reach out to him for support at any time!

settings.title: Take the fun, easy route towards health and happiness. Burn fat, strengthen your body, increase your energy, and restart your engine by following our two-week program!
Jaime's Programs
settings.text: See Jaime’s other 8-minute programs, the 28-Day Size Down Challenge for you, or the Little Black Dress for her.

settings.title: Share Your Story
settings.text: We’d love to hear about the journey you took to restart your engine. Please share your story and be an inspiration to others.

settings.title: Come back! You can do it again!
settings.text: Do you think your body could use another tune-up?  Come on back!  You own the program, so go for it anytime.
